summary: Ineffable Husbands Dance Fics\Fanart are inherently Blessed Concepts (heh) because it's 100% cannon that Aziraphale can only...
body: Ineffable Husbands Dance Fics\Fanart are inherently Blessed Concepts (heh) because it’s 100% cannon that Aziraphale can only dance the Gavotte and Crowley moves his body ‘like a white Soul singer’ and everyone knows the best dance fics are the one where they’re both just total dorks.

reblog.comment: Ineffable Husbands Dance Fics\Fanart are inherently Blessed Concepts (heh) because it’s 100% cannon that Aziraphale can only dance the Gavotte and Crowley moves his body ‘like a white Soul singer’ and everyone knows the best dance fics are the one where they’re both just total dorks.

summary: Goodnight, goodnight
title: Goodnight, goodnight
body:
Goodnight, goodnight, my dearest friend,

my comrade, the only one I want at my side.

I lock the doors and kill the lights

And know I will dream of you.

I’ll dream of golden eyes and savage rides and good laughs;

I’ll hear boot heals clicking out in the night, and hope it’s you.

It’s strange - this prickling under the skin, this space inside that’s you;

and I’d call it temptation, but it’s not like that all.

There is no lurking in the shadows, no deal, no trick;

for you’re pure flame, my darling, and there’s no shadow here.

You know how I am with these things, how hard to ‘pluck them out;

so I weave my heart in a string, and threaded it into an almost-rhyme;

it’s wonky and hasty and clumsy, but I’ll be better, and here I swear;

Once I’m in bed, too, I’ll close my eyes, and see you there.

Goodnight, goodnight, Raphael.

 

Aziraphale

summary:
Okay y’all get ready for a weird post but I want to talk about Aziraphale’s pinky ring for a second. 
When I first noticed it I...
body:
Okay y’all get ready for a weird post but I want to talk about Aziraphale’s pinky ring for a second.

When I first noticed it I was really delighted because I know it was a thing that gentlemen used to wear and I love the idea that he still wears one even though they sort of went out of style. But then I realized that he’s been wearing it for close to 6000 years and that changes a lot because there’s a very long history behind the meaning of pinky rings that has changed a lot and I love the idea people have seen Aziraphale wearing one and made some assumption about him and started wearing one.

For example, men and women who had no interest in marriage would wear pinky rings on their left hand to signify that they did not want to be in a relationship. I like the idea that enough people have known Aziraphale and his lack of interest in a relationship that they all started wearing pinky rings cause they were like that guys does it that must be why.

I also read somewhere that this tradition later led to gay men using a pinky ring to signify that they weren’t interested in women. Again I love that Aziraphale gives off such gay vibes that other gay men were like you know what that’s a great idea I’m gonna start wearing that ring too.

Gentlemen wore signant rings on their little fingers so they could easily seal envelopes. Imagine Aziraphale, panicking and without anything to seal his envelope with, just uses his ring. Wow what a good idea we should start using that.

I just love the idea that Crowley and Aziraphale accidentally started human traditions. Like calling your significant other “angel”. I can just see Aziraphale accidentally setting up all these meanings for a ring just because he thought it looked nifty.

summary: The first time Crowley says “I love you”
body:
The first time Crowley says “I love you”

Ok please be gentle because this is my first mini fic thing I’ve ever written. Anyways, I hope you enjoy my random jumble of words!

•

•

•

He hadn’t meant to say it. He really didn’t. It just came out after spending a large amount of the day in Aziraphale’s bookshop.


“Alright I’m gonna go. Love you angel.”


At the other end of the room Aziraphale stiffened, nearly dropping the stack of books he had been holding in his hands. After a long awkward silence, Crowley had finally realized what he said.


“I mean-uh- Can’t keep the Bentley waiting! Thanks angel!”


Just as the demon turned around to walk out the door to avoid further embarrassment, there was a squeaky “Wait!” from the other side of the now slightly tense room. Crowley turned back around and looked the angel in the eye. Both of their faces growing a bright shade of red.


“I… I love you too.”


Crowley stared at Aziraphale for a long quiet minute. “Right! Well, I really should be going now. See you later, angel. Same time tomorrow?”


Aziraphale nodded at him with a shy smile as he watched Crowley walk out the front door. Crowley wouldn’t have known it, but there was then an intense feeling of love radiating off of the bookshop. The angel chuckled to himself. “I love you too, my dear…”

reblog.comment:
The first time Crowley says “I love you”

summary: Aziraphale reads the great gatsby when it comes out in 1925 and doesn't miss the gay undertones, and he starts calling crowley...
body:
Aziraphale reads the great gatsby when it comes out in 1925 and doesn’t miss the gay undertones, and he starts calling crowley “old sport” as a new pet name on the regular. Except crowley hasnt read it and is completely baffled at the times aziraphale chooses to use it because it’s not really supposed to be a pet name

Crowley: *bombs the church* Aziraphale: “that was very kind of you, old sport”

Crowley in 1967 when aziraphale gives him holy water: “should I say thank you?” Aziraphale: “better not, old sport”

Crowley: *drowns a duck at st james park* Aziraphale: “really, old sport”

Crowley: ???????????
